item.title: Which countries have 'won' at Covid-19?
item.description: 1 Winning Curves 2 Setting things up 2.1 Call your packages 2.2 Get that data 2.3 Tidying the data 2.4 Rolling mean of cases 2.5 Visualizing Rolling Means! 3 Let’s talk about Media Bias 4 Conclusion 1 Winning Curves A long, long time ago in a era long ago – a WHOLE FIVE MONTHS ago – there was a lot of talk about “flattening the curve” for COVID-19, namely, the number of new cases that were recorded per day.
